titleInfo.title: WSM Grand Ole Opry stars Flatt and Scruggs at the Adamsville High School

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) announcing WSM Grand Ole Opry stars Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs with the Foggy Mountain Boys at the Adamsville High School on May 25. Poster features a metal photoplate of Flatt and Scruggs.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
